# =====================================
#  BookMyTrain Project - .gitignore
# =====================================

# --- Java build files ---
*.class
*.jar
*.war
*.ear

# --- Logs and temp files ---
*.log
*.tmp
*.bak
*.swp

# --- Compiled output directories ---
/bin/
/build/
/out/

# --- VS Code configuration ---
.vscode/

# --- OS generated files ---
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db
desktop.ini

# --- IDE specific files ---
*.iml
.idea/
.classpath
.project
.settings/

# --- Local libraries (like JDBC drivers) ---
lib/
!lib/README.md   # keep a placeholder readme if you want

# --- Sensitive files (donâ€™t expose credentials) ---
*.env
*.properties
*.config

# --- Database dumps or backups ---
*.sql
*.db
*.sqlite

# --- Miscellaneous ---
*.zip
*.rar
